articles.author: Harriet Torry
articles.title: Omicron Wave Drives Surge of Workers Calling In Sick, Working Through Illness - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Almost 8.8 million Americans were out sick or caring for someone with Covid-19 in early January
articles.content: The Omicron wave of coronavirus cases is weighing on the U.S. labor force, keeping millions of people home sick while others say they are working through illnesses.This double impact from the biggest… [+5138 chars]
